resources.string: Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This Application requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > .

string-array.name: Complaint_Type
string-array.item: Parking available but not allowed by parking person
Parked vehicle used by parking person
